title: Bug 5161More info in Console open on type dialog
description: Bug 5161More info in Console open on type dialog
OB: When open on type gets multiple hits in the same package you cannot determinewhich file you are opening.For example, if I have one version of a class insource, and one in a jar, then I have no idea which one I'm opening.
SR: When open on type gets multiple hits in the same package you cannot determinewhich file you are opening.For example, if I have one version of a class insource, and one in a jar, then I have no idea which one I'm opening.
